Cuneify REPL

Type ASCII Transliteration Format (ATF) notation in the left editor below and it will be transformed into cuneiform characters.

This page is based on the Cuneify project source code by Steve Tinney and Tom Gillam.

Sample ATF syntax: {f}KURUN.NA szu-a-ti u2-ka-an-nu-szi-ma a-na me#-e i-na#-[ad-du]-u2-szi
